title: Collaborative Science Learning Design Based on Computer Laboratory Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science concepts and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: A digital literacy integration program to strengthen science education within vocational training institutions.

learning_goals: Students collaboratively analyze ≥3 science experiment scenarios and derive results using computer simulation tools
Learners systematically record and interpret virtual experiment data through role allocation with team members in digital environments
≥80% of learners demonstrate expert-level reasoning patterns by applying scientific problem-solving strategies in collaborative learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
